events.message: I reported my vehicle accident to the insurance company immediately after the collision last weekend.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the details provided about the car collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle the accident claim for my car, and I was given their contact details.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of my claim and assured me they will process it promptly.
I was asked to submit photographs of the damaged vehicle and a police report to support my accident claim.
All required accident documents including photos and the police report have been uploaded to the claim portal.
The insurance adjuster has begun investigating the collision details and vehicle damage to verify the claim.
The investigation into my car accident has been completed based on the submitted evidence and reports.
The insurance company proposed a settlement amount to cover the repair costs for the accident damage.
I provided feedback on the claims process, mentioning the helpfulness of the agent and timely updates.
My auto accident claim was officially approved, allowing me to proceed with vehicle repairs immediately.
The payment for the agreed settlement has been transferred to my account to cover the repair expenses.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation of repair completion.
